Scripts.PostClick: PoisonerOptions_SaveSettings();

PoisonerOptions_SaveSettings(); if (POISONER_CONFIG.Buttons.LDBIcon.hide == "false") then PoisonerOptions_ChkBox_MenuParentMinimapText:SetTextColor(0.94, 0.77, 0, 1) elseif (POISONER_CONFIG.Buttons.LDBIcon.hide == "true") then PoisonerOptions_ChkBox_MenuParentMinimapText:SetTextColor(0.37647058823529411764705882352941, 0.37647058823529411764705882352941, 0.37647058823529411764705882352941, 1) end

PoisonerOptions_SaveSettings(); if (POISONER_CONFIG.Buttons.FreeButton.Active == 1) then PoisonerOptions_ChkBox_FBLockText:SetTextColor(1, 1, 1, 1) elseif (POISONER_CONFIG.Buttons.FreeButton.Active == 0) then PoisonerOptions_ChkBox_FBLockText:SetTextColor(0.37647058823529411764705882352941, 0.37647058823529411764705882352941, 0.37647058823529411764705882352941, 1) end
PoisonerOptions_SaveSettings();
PoisonerOptions_SaveSettings();
PoisonerOptions_SaveSettings();
PoisonerOptions_SaveSettings();

if PoisonerOptions_ChkBox_MenuParentOwn:GetChecked() then PoisonerOptions_ChkBox_MenuParentMinimap:SetChecked(false) else PoisonerOptions_ChkBox_MenuParentMinimap:SetChecked(true) end PoisonerOptions_SaveSettings();

if PoisonerOptions_ChkBox_MenuParentMinimap:GetChecked() then PoisonerOptions_ChkBox_MenuParentOwn:SetChecked(false) else PoisonerOptions_ChkBox_MenuParentOwn:SetChecked(true) end PoisonerOptions_SaveSettings();

Scripts.OnLoad: local overlay = self:CreateTexture(nil, "OVERLAY") overlay:SetWidth(53); overlay:SetHeight(53) overlay:SetTexture("Interface\\Minimap\\MiniMap-TrackingBorder") overlay:SetPoint("TOPLEFT") local background = self:CreateTexture(nil, "BACKGROUND") background:SetWidth(20); background:SetHeight(20) background:SetTexture("Interface\\Minimap\\UI-Minimap-Background") background:SetPoint("TOPLEFT", 7, -5) local icon = self:CreateTexture(nil, "ARTWORK") icon:SetWidth(20); icon:SetHeight(20) icon:SetTexture("Interface\\Icons\\Spell_Nature_CorrosiveBreath") icon:SetTexCoord(0.05, 0.95, 0.05, 0.95) icon:SetPoint("TOPLEFT", 7, -5)

Scripts.OnValueChanged: local value = self:GetValue() local newValue = Poisoner_round(value,0) self:SetValue(newValue) getglobal(self:GetName().."Text"):SetText(newValue); POISONER_CONFIG.Menu.Spacing = newValue

Scripts.PostClick: if PoisonerOptions_ChkBox_ToolTipFull:GetChecked() then PoisonerOptions_ChkBox_ToolTipName:SetChecked(false) else PoisonerOptions_ChkBox_ToolTipName:SetChecked(true) end PoisonerOptions_SaveSettings();

if PoisonerOptions_ChkBox_ToolTipName:GetChecked() then PoisonerOptions_ChkBox_ToolTipFull:SetChecked(false) else PoisonerOptions_ChkBox_ToolTipFull:SetChecked(true) end PoisonerOptions_SaveSettings();
PoisonerOptions_SaveSettings();
if self:GetChecked() then PoisonerOptions_CallUpdate() end PoisonerOptions_SaveSettings();
PoisonerOptions_SaveSettings();
PoisonerOptions_SaveSettings();
if self:GetChecked() then PoisonerOptions_CallUpdate() end PoisonerOptions_SaveSettings();
if self:GetChecked() then PoisonerOptions_CallUpdate() end PoisonerOptions_SaveSettings();

if self:GetChecked() then PoisonerOptions_CallUpdate() end PoisonerOptions_SaveSettings();
if self:GetChecked() then PoisonerOptions_CallUpdate() end PoisonerOptions_SaveSettings();
if self:GetChecked() then PoisonerOptions_CallUpdate() end PoisonerOptions_SaveSettings();
PoisonerOptions_SaveSettings();

Scripts.OnValueChanged: local value = self:GetValue() local newValue = Poisoner_round(value,1) self:SetValue(newValue) getglobal(self:GetName().."Text"):SetText(newValue); PoisonerTimer_IconFrameScale = newValue PoisonerTimer_IconFrame:SetScale(PoisonerTimer_IconFrameScale) POISONER_CONFIG.Timer.Scale = PoisonerTimer_IconFrameScale

local value = self:GetValue() local newValue = Poisoner_round(value,1) self:SetValue(newValue) getglobal(self:GetName().."Text"):SetText(newValue); PoisonerTimer_IconFrameAlpha = newValue PoisonerTimer_IconFrame:SetAlpha(PoisonerTimer_IconFrameAlpha) POISONER_CONFIG.Timer.Alpha = PoisonerTimer_IconFrameAlpha

Scripts.PostClick: PoisonerOptions_SaveSettings(); if (POISONER_CONFIG.Buy.Active == 1) then PoisonerOptions_ChkBox_AutoBuy_PromptText:SetTextColor(0.94, 0.77, 0, 1) elseif (POISONER_CONFIG.Buy.Active == 0) then PoisonerOptions_ChkBox_AutoBuy_PromptText:SetTextColor(0.37647058823529411764705882352941, 0.37647058823529411764705882352941, 0.37647058823529411764705882352941, 1) end
PoisonerOptions_SaveSettings();
PoisonerOptions_SaveSettings();

Scripts.OnValueChanged: local value = self:GetValue() local newValue = Poisoner_round(value,1) self:SetValue(newValue) getglobal(self:GetName().."Text"):SetText(newValue); Poisoner_QuickButton_Overlay:SetScale(newValue) POISONER_CONFIG.Buttons.QuickButton.Scale = newValue
